title: Citibank Letterhead
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Letterpress and photomechanical reproduction on thin white tracing paper
description: Along upper edge, CITIBANK in red embossed sans serif letters followed by Citibank logo (oval with a four pointed star) in red at upper right.  Thin red line across sheet from left to right.  Below line, in red at upper left: Citibank, N.A.  At right center in large thinly stripped letters: Copy
name: Print
